mapper.select: SELECT A.timetable_id , B.start_time , B.end_time , C.title , D.seat_id , E.seat_name , B.price FROM TN_TK_CART A , TN_TK_TIMETABLE B , TN_TK_ITEM C , TN_TK_RESERVED_SEATS D , TN_TK_SEAT E WHERE A.timetable_id = B.timetable_id AND B.item_id = C.item_id AND B.timetable_id = D.timetable_id AND A.SEAT_ID = D.SEAT_ID AND D.seat_id = E.seat_id AND A.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY A.created_at
